{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R6250 |revision= |upc=606449096064 |asin=B00BR3ZYIW |series=AC1600 |fcc_date=03/18/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H245 |manuf_rev=T00 |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY312400219 |ic_id=4054A-12400219 |pcb_id=U12H245T00 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4708A0 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0D-SCB0 |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L1606EM2I-12G |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646E-BCK0 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43217 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, FreshTomato-ARM |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC1600 Smart Wi-Fi Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=R6250}} {{â€¢}} [ftp://downloads.netgear.com/r6250/ Downloads]
*OEM: [[Foxconn]] ([[Ambit]]) [https://github.com/mirror/dd-wrt/blob/master/src/router/netgear/ambitCfg-r6250.h U12H245T00]
Additional specifications, per '''NETGEAR''''s manual, follow... *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::195 mm x 199 mm x 65 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::417 g]]
The RAM chip is shown as a single ''Samsung'' K4B1G1646G in the FCC photos.
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32114-netgear-r6250-smart-wifi-router-reviewed ''NETGEAR R6250 Smart WiFi Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32072-netgear-puts-an-ac-router-in-the-middle ''NETGEAR puts an AC Router in the middle'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=172774 ''Netgear R6250 (ARM, 256MB RAM, 128MB Flash)'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forum] :(w/ ''nvram show'', ''dmesg'', and ''/proc/meminfo''/''cpuinfo'' output) :/proc/cpuinfo output notes the processor as ''ARMv7 Processor rev 0 (v7l)'' :and hardware platform as ''Northstar Prototype''. *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=172774 Thread regarding DD-WRT support on the '''DD-WRT''' forum] :[http://www.myopenrouter.com/download/48772/DD-WRT-BETA-for-NETGEAR-R6250/ ''Tathagata Das's BETA DD-WRT build'' on '''MyOpenRouter''']
